lines.text: for i = 1 to n inclusive , and increase j by 2 at the end of every loop
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i <= n ; i += 2 )

lines.text: for j = 2 to n - i inclusive , and increase k by 2 at the end of every loop , then print *
lines.code: for ( int j = 2 ; j <= n - i ; j += 2 ) { cout << " * " ; }

lines.text: for k = 1 to i inclusive , then print D
lines.code: for ( int k = 1 ; k <= i ; k ++ ) { cout << " D " ; }

lines.text: for j = 2 to n - i inclusive , and increase j by 2 at the end of every loop , then print *
lines.code: for ( int j = 2 ; j <= n - i ; j += 2 ) { cout << " * " ; }

lines.text: for i = 1 to n exclusive , and increase i by 2 at the end of every loop
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i < n ; i += 2 )

lines.text: for k = 1 to i inclusive , and increase i by 2 at the end of every loop , then print *
lines.code: for ( int k = 1 ; k <= i ; k += 2 ) { cout << " * " ; }

lines.text: for j = n - 2 to i inclusive , and decrease i by 1 at the end of every loop , then print D
lines.code: for ( int j = n - 2 ; j >= i ; j -- ) { cout << " D " ; }

lines.text: for k = 1 to i inclusive , and increase i by 2 at the end of every loop , then print *
lines.code: for ( int k = 1 ; k <= i ; k += 2 ) { cout << " * " ; }
